title: Clube de Rugby de Évora
text: Clube de Rugby de Évora is a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> team based in <a href="%C3%89vora">Évora</a>, Portugal. In the 2016/17 season, they played in the First Division of the <a href="Campeonato%20Nacional%20de%20Rugby">Campeonato Nacional de Rugby</a> (National Championship).
